name.baseName: Silica production ; Total of all wind farm
硅土生产 ; 整个风电场

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The data set describes the life cycle assessment of the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), China's first offshore wind farm, and its application to generate on-grid electricity. The technical usage of this data set is for analyzing and understanding the environmental impact throughout the different stages of an offshore wind farm's life cycle, particularly one located within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, and comparable to those constructed outside Europe. It pertains to the material and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, as well as the dismantling and recycling of the wind farm.
该数据集描述了中国第一个海上风电场——东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）的全生命周期评估，及其用于发电上网电力的应用。该数据集的技术用途是分析和理解海上风电场全生命周期中的环境影响，特别是位于上海管辖范围内的，以及与欧洲以外建造的相比较的风电场。它涉及到风电场的材料和设备制造、运输和安装、运行和维护，以及拆解和回收。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the life cycle assessment of the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), China's first offshore wind farm, and its application to generate on-grid electricity. The technical usage of this data set is for analyzing and understanding the environmental impact throughout the different stages of an offshore wind farm's life cycle, particularly one located within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, and comparable to those constructed outside Europe. It pertains to the material and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, as well as the dismantling and recycling of the wind farm.
该数据集描述了中国第一个海上风电场——东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）的全生命周期评估，及其用于发电上网电力的应用。该数据集的技术用途是分析和理解海上风电场全生命周期中的环境影响，特别是位于上海管辖范围内的，以及与欧洲以外建造的相比较的风电场。它涉及到风电场的材料和设备制造、运输和安装、运行和维护，以及拆解和回收。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.
风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set, consider the end-use applications of on-grid electricity generation by an offshore wind farm. Users should carefully account for the life cycle stages specified (manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling) in environmental impact assessments. Be attentive to the assumptions and parameters outlined in the sensitivity analysis section when applying this data for comparison or modeling purposes, especially in light of the uncertainties related to model parameters and input data. Recognize that the transportation energy, installation energy, and emissions data are based on the specific construction plan of the DBOWF, and adjust your analyses accordingly when applying the dataset to other wind farms with different construction or operating conditions.

使用这个数据集时，请考虑海上风电场发电上网的最终用途应用。用户应在环境影响评估中仔细计量指定的生命周期阶段（制造、运输和安装、运行和维护、拆解和回收）。应用这些数据进行比较或建模时，特别注意敏感性分析部分概述的假设和参数，尤其是考虑到与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性。认识到运输能源、安装能源和排放数据是基于DBOWF具体施工计划的，当将数据集应用于其他具有不同施工或运行条件的风电场时，相应调整您的分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
